headline: CloudFlare's 25th data center turns up to ease collective disappointment of Spanish fútbol fans
keywords: Data Center, Cloudflare Network, Spain, Europe
description: After a drubbing earlier today of La Roja by The Flying Dutchmen, we felt obliged to deliver at least one piece of good news to the 34 million fútbol loving Internet users in Spain: CloudFlare's 25th data center in Madrid, Spain.
